title: First skin you ever bought?

replies.body: I thought it was customary for all new players to spend the rp you get from leveling up on a master yi skin xd
If I remember correctly, it was Phoenix {{champion:133}}.
Eternum Nocturne, once my fave champ always my fave champ, and now through mystery gifts i have all but ravager
My first skin was Sewn Chaos Orianna, because she used to be my main at the time. I just found it so delightfully creepy >:D
Shut up, I have every tristana skin except guerilla from mystery gifts
I don't play new tristana

I first bought Team Spirit Anivia, back when it was first released. 
My friend bought Spirit Guard Udyr as his first skin when he was level 5, I repeat, level 5. He is now level 30 and to this day I have never seen him use Udyr. RP well spent!
Sinful Succulence Morgana
Cottontail teemo cause teemo >:D

Peeps saying "I GOT ROCKET GIRL TRISTANA FIRST" need to realise that was free, therefore not bought, and this thread asks you what you bought first.

Mine was Bandit Sivir.
Wtf, I can't play Sivir and ADC is my worst role.
riot kayle/arcade miss fortune. got them both at the same time free from Armageddon in Auckland

Mercenary Kat.
Bloody mystery skins.
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4j26pFduGLk/TqkcSn3SYbI/AAAAAAAABF4/3nasUd1dOGE/s400/Fiddlesticks+Surprise+Final3.jpg

Bought Tundra Hunter {{champion:19}} at Level 6. Used to play WW a ton when i was still on the NA Servers. Shame i don't alot anymore though. Though i still keep up to date on when he's Nerfed/Buffed so i can have a reason to play him as Jungle again.

*Still waiting for Marauder Warwick to be available for purchase...*

I bought Battle Regalia Poppy. I was level 19 and I was trying to find a champion to play (I was only using free week champs until that point). The skin was on sale and I loved the splash art for the skin, so I went on the LoL wiki to learn about Poppy. I was happy about her price, and happy about her skill set. Bing bada boom I found my first main champion :)

Dragonknight Mordekaiser, when it was still in the shop as an normal item.

I bought it free too, since Riot gave out some RP when they had server crashes back on NA some time ago, and that Mord skin was on sale at that time.
assassin master yi

Ice Drake Shyvana.

idk why.

mercenary katarina, was playing with some mates when i first started and they were sick of me playing kat over and over and they said you should atleast have a skin for her, little did i know, worst skin oce.........
Ghostbride morgana at level 17. A reward for my first pentakill :D
riot girl tristana. i think it explains itself.
